message.content: {"given_definition_quality":65,"better_definition":"to hit, to strike, or to play (by hitting)","sentence":"他打球。","image_prompt":"A young person, stylized in soft apocalypse animation, is playing with a ball. The scene is calm and tinted with pastel colors; the environment is subtly weathered and slightly mystical, evoking an abandoned playground but with peaceful overgrown plants. The person is in mid-action, striking or hitting the ball, conveying movement and energy.","sentence_translation":"He plays ball."}
